title: Justice Ginsburg Awake And 'Demanding Work' After Heart Procedure
teaser: Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is said to be resting comfortably after undergoing a heart procedure.
contentencoded:
Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is said to be resting comfortably after undergoing a heart procedure. According to a statement from the nation’s highest court, she experienced discomfort during routine exercise and was taken in to a Washington, D.C. area hospital.

NPR Legal Affairs Correspondent Nina Totenberg tells Here & Now’s Robin Young how Justice Ginsburg is doing and whether health scares like this can affect a justice’s time on the bench.

Guest

  • Nina Totenberg, legal affairs correspondent for NPR. She tweets @NinaTotenberg.
